featured.text: Requirements for a 14-day non-visa entry are: passport good for at least six months, confirmed onward ticket within 14 days, no violation of law recorded.
The encouraging response to McCarroll’s show confirmed that change is happening in fashion.

definition.zh_def: 確認，證實某事的真實性或有效性。
definition.en_def: To establish the truth or correctness of something.
definition.example: Please confirm your attendance at the meeting.
